version.h File Reference

Namespaces

namespace  thrust
 

thrust is the top-level namespace which contains all Thrust functions and types.


namespace  deprecated
 

The deprecated namespace contains functionality which is scheduled to be removed in a future version of Thrust.


namespace  next
 

The next namespace contains functionality which is scheduled to be promoted to the top-level thrust namespace in a future version of Thrust.


Detailed Description

Compile-time macros encoding Thrust release version.

<thrust/version.h> is the only Thrust header that is guaranteed to change with every thrust release.
